title: Epic: Frontend
description:
Minimal frontend for hackathon demo.

## Pages
- Login page with Meta OAuth button
- Dashboard with account selector
- Recommendations view with approve/reject
- Execution confirmation view

## Stack
- Next.js + TypeScript
- shadcn/ui components
- Tailwind CSS

comments.author: recovery-sync
comments.text: Closed by recovery sync: Epic complete - Frontend deployed to Cloud Run
